definition: colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Hook the French window when you come in.
sentences.chinese: 你進來的時候把落地窗勾好。

sentences.english: Large floor-to-ceiling windows create dazzling displays of sunlight and transparency inside the house.
sentences.chinese: 大落地窗給室內帶來了耀眼的陽光和通透度。

sentences.english: French window, yarn tendril, classical single person sofa chair.
sentences.chinese: 落地窗，紗蔓，古典單人沙發休閒椅。

sentences.english: But in here, still in the rainy days, the French windows.
sentences.chinese: 卻塬來，還是會在陰雨天，落地窗旁。

sentences.english: When entering, I was struck by the entire wall window.
sentences.chinese: 進去之後，我被它全落地窗式的設計震撼了。

sentences.english: The baster bedroom with the king size bed, facing south, bright and sunny.
sentences.chinese: 主臥室朝南，大落地窗使得整個房間明亮。

sentences.english: This is a French window. It's facing the back garden.
sentences.chinese: 這是扇落地窗，朝向後花園。

sentences.english: The main floor of each flat has floor-to-ceiling windows across its entire breadth, facing onto a terrace.
sentences.chinese: 每間公寓的前立面均設有巨大的落地窗。

sentences.english: Floor-to-ceiling windows and glass-walled balconies offer expansive views of the urban landscape.
sentences.chinese: 落地窗和玻璃牆的陽臺提供開闊的城市景觀。

definition: balcony/patio/flat roof/terrace/deck (unroofed platform)/outdoor stage/ancient imperial celestial observation terrace
drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
by the window (referring to seats on a plane etc)
